author: Staff Reporter
text:
Residents of Kutharipalayam near Sirumugai caught a crocodile that strayed into the village through a canal on Saturday night.

Around 9.30 p.m. on Saturday, Yuvaraj (27) was walking on the banks of the canal flowing from Bhavani river when he heard a strange sound in the canal. On turning on the flash light of his mobile phone, he saw a six-foot-long crocodile, and alerted the villagers. A few people rushed to the spot, and struggled for two hours to catch. They lifted the reptile that weighed about 70 kg from the water and informed the forest officials. Later, the officials released the crocodile in the Bhavani catchment area.
title: Crocodile caught in canal
